title: Democrats Blocking Miners' Healthcare
summary: The bill to extend health benefits for certain coal miners was introduced by a Democrat and was co-sponsored by mostly Democrats.

checks.name: The New York Times
checks.shortQuote: The bill to extend health benefits for certain coal miners was introduced by a Democrat and was co-sponsored by mostly Democrats.

checks.name: MSNBC
checks.quote: Whether the president was lying or ignorant was unclear, but either way, the claim was largely the opposite of the truth. Congressional Democrats were the ones fighting for a permanent fix to the retired minersâ€™ trouble with health care coverage, but they faced Republican resistance.
